bike.description: M5 Alloy w/ORE technology, fully butted, 75 or 90mm of travel, cartidge bearing pivots & Ti bolt kit, disc compatible

components.description: Fox Float RC, adjustable rebound and compression lockout, 75mm/90mm travel, 6.0" x 1.25"
Specialized, alloy clamp, w/QR binder, 35.0 ID, black

To complete builing this bike, you'll need to know the following: Front derailleur is Shimano "E" type & top-pull, seat post diameter is 30.9mm, heat tube diameter is 1-1/8", bottom bracket shell width is 68mm.
